name: V2
description:
Fallet: The Ultimate Design & Engineering Blueprint
1. Visual Core (Design System)
Color Palette:
Background (Base): #0e0e10 (Deep Dark)
Surface (Cards): #1e1e1e (Zinc-900 equivalent)
Border (Default): #0e0e10/30 or zinc-800/80
Accent Primary: #2563eb (Blue-600)
Accent Success: #10b981 (Emerald-500)
Accent Danger: #e11d48 (Rose-600)
Text Primary: #f4f4f5 (Zinc-100)
Text Secondary: #a1a1aa (Zinc-400)
Text Muted: #71717a (Zinc-500)
Typography:
Font Family: 'Inter', sans-serif.
Heading 1 (App Title): 20px, Medium, Uppercase, Tracking-tight.
Heading 2 (Section Title): 16px, Medium, Tracking-tight.
Amount Display (Entry): 48px, Light (300), Tighter tracking.
Transaction Title: 15px, Medium.
Metadata (Labels): 10px, Medium, Uppercase, Tracking-widest.
Small Metadata: 9px, Normal, Uppercase, Tracking-tighter.
2. Component Templates (Fixed Dimensions)
Account Card:
Height: 84px.
Corner Radius: rounded-[4px].
Layout: Vertical Flex (Icon/Name top, Currency/Balance bottom).
Transaction Record Item:
Min-Height: 82px.
Icon Container: w-10 h-10 Circle.
Layout: Horizontal Flex (Icon | Description/Account | Amount/Date).
Selection Border: Blue-600 (at 20% opacity).
FAB (Floating Action Button):
Size: 56x56px (w-14 h-14).
Position: bottom-[114px], right-6.
Corner Radius: rounded-[12px].
Bottom Navigation:
Padding: p-3, pb-10 (includes safe-area).
Position: fixed bottom-0.
3. Layout & Spacing (X & Y)
Main Container: max-w-md (Standard mobile width), mx-auto.
Padding Default: p-4 (16px) for headers and forms.
Grid (Account Selection): 3-column, gap-1.5 (6px).
Safe Areas:
safe-top: env(safe-area-inset-top)
safe-bottom: env(safe-area-inset-bottom)
Z-Index Hierarchy:
Nav: 40
FAB: 50
Bulk Header: 60
Modals: 100+
Pickers: 200+
4. Interaction & Gesture Logic
Swipe-to-Action (Transactions):
Trigger: Left swipe.
Swipe Limit: -180px.
Actions: Split, Clone, Delete (Equal width).
Transition: cubic-bezier(0.16, 1, 0.3, 1) (Out-expo).
Long Press (Multi-Select):
Duration: 600ms.
Feedback: Haptic (Vibration 50ms).
Account Reordering (Settings):
Mechanism: Global PointerMove listener.
Feedback: Haptic (Vibration 20ms on grab).
Visual: scale-[1.03], opacity-40, z-50 for active dragging item.
Calculator Keypad:
4x4 Grid, h-14 buttons.
Evaluation: String-based arithmetic (eval()).
5. Technical Logic & State Management
Balance Persistence: Chronological calculation using Map object (id-accountId keys) for "Pre-balance" snapshotting.
Rounding Rules:
IRR: No decimals.
USD/EUR/Crypto: 2 decimals.
Filtering: Multi-account selection state updates the visible transaction list reactively.
Categories: 2-tier tree (Category > Subcategory) with record dependency checking (prevents deletion if in use).
6. Offline & PWA Specs
Service Worker: fallet-v2 cache.
Assets Cached: index.html, manifest.json, index.tsx, App.tsx.
App Theme Color: #0e0e10.
